group_1.textLeft: Please accept the Grief Seed.
As I said before.
I didn't mean to intrude on your territory.

group_1.textRight: Um, but...

group_1.textLeft: My apologies—where are my manners?
My name is Yozuru Sasame. I’m a member of @Puella Care.

group_1.textRight: Oh...

group_1.narration: I'd heard a lot about Puella Care @from Iroha and the others,
but this was the first time I had @actually met someone from there...

group_1.textLeft: We’re going in the same direction, Miss Leila.
Are you attending that chocolate cake class @as well?

group_1.textRight: Wait, you’re going there, too?

group_1.textLeft: That’s right.

group_1.narration: So Yozuru must have noticed @that Witch near the venue,
but was concerned that she might’ve been @interfering on someone else’s territory.

group_1.textRight: Are you planning on making a cake for someone?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
I have a mentor who has been so helpful to me @every day. I’d like to express my gratitude.
How about you?

group_1.textRight: I want to give some tasty chocolate to my @two best friends!
But...

group_1.textLeft: But what?

group_1.textRight: I don’t think I can actually do it...
So I'm trying to learn how to bake again, @starting from the ground up.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...

group_1.textRight: Oh...

group_1.textLeft: It's snowing.
Seeing you in that hat of yours—it makes me @think of the Yukinko.

group_1.textRight: What are those?

group_1.textLeft: They're small, cute snow fairies of sorts. @They appear in traditional folklore.
Sometimes they’re known as the Snow Maidens.
They're very kindhearted spirits.
According to one legend, one appeared in @response to an old couple's wish to have a child.
She acted like a human child, and put their hearts @at ease.
But when spring came, she melted and @disappeared with the snow.

group_1.textRight: That story, it's... @It’s kind of like me, isn’t it…?

group_1.textLeft: How so?

group_1.narration: Hearing her story about the Yukinko...
It felt like I’d been shot in the heart.

group_1.textRight: Well, it’s...kind of a long story, but...
Basically, I lost my confidence because...

group_1.textLeft: ...So you were trying to make your friends happy, @but failed?

group_1.textRight: Yes. It still feels like it was just yesterday...
That legend of the Yukinko you just told me...
It made me realize something.
I've always taken it for granted...
That I just naturally get along with everyone.
But I think, without realizing it, I’ve actually been @changing myself.
So I could fit in with the people around me.
But if I keep doing this, then eventually...
I’m going to lose track of who I am and what I @really want.
It feels like I’ll melt away... @Just like that Yukinko did!
It shouldn’t be like this.
My friends said I could do whatever I wanted, @and I couldn’t even manage that.
I feel like such a mess...
...Oh my goodness, I’m so sorry! I didn’t mean to @go off like this when we've just met!

group_1.textLeft: No, it’s fine. If you’d like to hear my opinion.
It seems to me that, in your story, @your biggest mistake...
Was that you hadn’t tasted the muffins first.
...Ah, I said something wrong, didn't I?

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: What should I do in this situation...apologize?

group_1.textRight: (What is that? A notebook...?)

group_1.textLeft: ...Miss Leila, I spoke too rashly.

group_1.textRight: Eh?

group_1.textLeft: Your faith in yourself had been wavering...
And yet I spoke carelessly and upset you.
You have my deepest apologies.

group_1.textRight: Oh, no, there’s no need to apologize!
I’m sorry for making you feel uncomfortable...

group_1.textLeft: ...Well...
My impression is that you're a very kind person @by nature.

group_1.textRight: What...?

group_1.textLeft: Even in the midst of your struggles.
Even as you're losing sight of yourself.
You're worried about disappointing your loved @ones more than anything else.
Not everyone is capable of that sort of kindness, @of putting other people before yourself.

group_1.textRight: ...Thank you, Yozuru. You're very kind, too.

group_1.textLeft: ...Really?

group_1.textRight: ...Oh my gosh, look at the time!
I'm sorry for keeping you! @We have to hurry over there right now!

group_1.textLeft: Yes. Our class is about to start.
